name: Lazycat
description:
You're a laser-cat and you need to get rid of these laser-mice! Click and hold to fire your laser eyes! Keyboard controls are arrow keys and spacebar.

This game is a remake of something I made with a friend many years ago. For whatever reason, we'd chosen PyGame as our game engine which turned out to be a mistake because getting it to run on anything other than Linux was a pain. Now I've rewritten it in Haxe with Heaps so it can run in the browser.

I hope you enjoy playing this game as much as I did making it (twice).
